item.description:
This will be the first ever Django User Group meeting in Boston/Cambridge, and Shimon Rura has offered to give a short talk about Django's newforms.

"In a few of my recent projects, I've gotten to know django forms (aka newforms) pretty intimately. I'd be happy to give a 10-20min talk on django forms wizardry, covering topics from custom widgets to dynamically generating form classes."

Thanks Shimon!

In the second half of the meeting Nate and Shimon will talk about Gigblastr, a Django-based application they built which is deployed on Google App Engine. We will discuss the reasons for choosing GAE as a deployment, the peculiarities of using GAE, and where the project is headed next. http://www.gigblastr....

In the remaining time we will open it up for questions and/or lightning talks. Looking forward to this inaugural Django meeting!

-Nate
item.name: Cambridge Django October Meetup
